channel.title: LFI on conflict

item.title: ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ RushCTF 2023 - web/blog
item.description: Note Second web challenge from the RushCTF 2023. Description Hey what do you think about my blog? Hint: where are password’s stored? Recon The main page is a beautiful default blog page, nothing much to do here If we look around and try to see posts, we can see that they’re fetched through a GET parameter: Exploitation This kind of parameter is usually vulnerable to LFI, which would allow us to render any file from the server.
